mapper.select: select fmc.f_measure_check_id, fmc.order_id, fmc.check_item, fmc.cdate, fmc.measure_data, fmc.result, fmc.note, emp.emp_name from final_measuret_check fmc left join employee emp on emp.emp_id = fmc.emp_id;
mapper.insert: insert into final_measuret_check ( f_measure_check_id, order_id, check_item, cdate, measure_data, result, note, emp_id) values ( #{endProductQualify.fMeasureCheckId}, #{endProductQualify.orderId}, #{endProductQualify.checkItem}, #{endProductQualify.cdate}, #{endProductQualify.measureData}, #{endProductQualify.result}, #{endProductQualify.note}, #{endProductQualify.empId});
